snippet.title: MarZ Rising Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
MarZ Rising is a tactical base defense game, which lets you discover a completely new gameplay experience of the tower defense genre! Build, manage and defend your martian base. Guide your crew safely through the thrilling campaign and solve the mystery of the undead. 

Available on Steam Early Access:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/682530/MarZ_Rising/

http://marzrising.com
